com.gej.object.types

Class AngularGObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gej.object.GObject
      • com.gej.object.types.AngularGObject
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Updateable

    public class AngularGObject
extends GObject
    A customized object to move along a direction specified by angle in degrees. The angles are as follows: 
     0°   : moving upwards
 90°  : moving right or stationary
 180° : moving down
 270° : moving left
    Author:
    Sri Harsha Chilakapati

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description

      Constructs an object with an animation at a position x,y

      Constructs an invisible object at a position x,y
      AngularGObject(java.awt.Image img)
      Constructs an object with an image object.

      Constructs an object with an image at a position x,y

    • Method Detail

      • setVelocity

        public void setVelocity(float vel)
        Sets the velocity of this object. The velocity must be always positive. If negative velocities are used, then the direction will be reversed.
        Parameters:
        vel - The new velocity of this object.

      • getVelocity

        public float getVelocity()
        Gets you the current velocity of this object

        the current velocity of this object

        Parameters:
